GSD36katy2piu:43: atha cet sa dvibhāryaḥ syān K_908a
GSD36katy2piu:46: atha prāg eva dattā syāt K_649a
GSD36katy2piu:181: aprāpte vai sa kāle tu K_609c
GSD36katy2piu:254: alpaṃ vā bahu vā kālaṃ K_147c
GSD36katy2piu:290: asat sad iti yaḥ pakṣaḥ K_495a
GSD36katy2piu:344: ādadhyāt tat kathaṃ na syāc K_521c
GSD36katy2piu:351: ādhātā yatra na syāt tu K_529a
GSD36katy2piu:358: ādhim anyaṃ sa dāpyaḥ syād K_524c
GSD36katy2piu:359: ādhim ekaṃ dvayor yas tu K_517a
GSD36katy2piu:368: āptās te tu na sākṣiṇaḥ K_361d
GSD36katy2piu:486: ūrdhvaṃ labdhaṃ tu yat kiṃcit K_900a
GSD36katy2piu:494: ṛṇaṃ dāpyo damaṃ ca saḥ K_457d
GSD36katy2piu:570: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sa yad brūyāt K_087c
GSD36katy2piu:619: kalpito yasya yo daṇḍas tv K_102a
GSD36katy2piu:620: kalpito yasya yo daṇḍas tv K_490a
GSD36katy2piu:626: kāmāt tu saṃśritāṃ yas tu K_727a
GSD36katy2piu:639: kāryaṃ tu sādhayed yo vai K_954c
GSD36katy2piu:643: kāryaṃ hi sādhyam ity uktaṃ K_216a
GSD36katy2piu:667: kāle ced anyathā na tu K_688d
GSD36katy2piu:676: kiṃ kāryaṃ kā ca te pīḍā K_086c
GSD36katy2piu:697: kuryur bhayād vā lobhād vā K_750c
GSD36katy2piu:782: krīta paṇyaṃ ca yaḥ krayī K_691b
GSD36katy2piu:837: gatāḥ syur ye tu madhyatām K_675b
GSD36katy2piu:842: garhyaḥ sa pāpo daṇḍyaś ca K_670c
GSD36katy2piu:989: jitaḥ purā mayāyaṃ ca tv K_178a
GSD36katy2piu:1034: tat tu kuryād ṛṇaṃ samam K_513b
GSD36katy2piu:1045: tatra karma ca yat kuryād K_714c
GSD36katy2piu:1050: tatra labdhaṃ tu yat kiñcit K_876e
GSD36katy2piu:1088: tathā tat syāt pramāṇaṃ tu K_272c
GSD36katy2piu:1152: tad om iti likhet sarvaṃ K_129c
GSD36katy2piu:1189: tam arthaṃ daṇḍam eva ca K_456d
GSD36katy2piu:1192: tayā prāptaṃ dhanaṃ yat tu K_867c
GSD36katy2piu:1216: tasminn arthe prabhus tu saḥ K_470b
GSD36katy2piu:1268: tāṃ kriyāṃ dveṣṭi yo mohāt K_198c
GSD36katy2piu:1276: tiṣṭhaṃś caikaḥ sa eva tu K_370b
GSD36katy2piu:1281: tīvrā sā prathitā tu vāk K_772d
GSD36katy2piu:1301: tebhyo dadyāt tu yad vasu K_497d
GSD36katy2piu:1312: te syur dāpyā ṛṇaṃ tathā K_403d
GSD36katy2piu:1336: tribhir eva tu yā bhuktā K_327a
GSD36katy2piu:1348: try ahaṃ saptāham eva vā K_133b
GSD36katy2piu:1356: daṇḍas tatra tu naiva syād K_482c
GSD36katy2piu:1368: daṇḍyaś ca na dadāti yaḥ K_610d
GSD36katy2piu:1373: daṇḍyā syuḥ sarva eva te K_726d
GSD36katy2piu:1396: dadyāt tam atha vā cauraṃ K_817c
GSD36katy2piu:1406: dadyās tvam iti yo dattaḥ K_611c
GSD36katy2piu:1431: dātā na labhate tat tu K_497c
GSD36katy2piu:1453: dāpyaḥ syāt tad ṛṇaṃ sutaḥ K_534d
GSD36katy2piu:1468: dāsasya tu dhanaṃ yat syāt K_724a
GSD36katy2piu:1541: deyaṃ tair eva tad bhavet K_674d
GSD36katy2piu:1665: dhanaṃ dāpyo damaṃ ca saḥ K_619d
GSD36katy2piu:1725: na ca tāṃ bhajate punaḥ K_908b
GSD36katy2piu:1726: na ca putro dhanaṃ haret K_559b
GSD36katy2piu:1728: na ca yāceta yaḥ kaścil K_630c
GSD36katy2piu:1747: na tu dāpyo hṛtaṃ corair K_659a
GSD36katy2piu:1748: na tu daivīṃ kriyāṃ nṛpaḥ K_218d
GSD36katy2piu:1749: na dagdhaṃ tu vidur devās K_441c
GSD36katy2piu:1753: na dadyād uttaraṃ tu yaḥ K_194b
GSD36katy2piu:1758: na dātā tatra daṇḍyaḥ syān K_651c
GSD36katy2piu:1759: na dānaṃ na ca vikrayaḥ K_853d
GSD36katy2piu:1761: na dāsī sānvayā tu sā K_723d
GSD36katy2piu:1762: na divyaṃ na ca lekhyakam K_228d
GSD36katy2piu:1763: na divyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ K_223d
GSD36katy2piu:1764: na divyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ K_225d
GSD36katy2piu:1768: na deyaṃ teṣu divyaṃ tu K_431c
GSD36katy2piu:1774: na pitā bhrātaro na ca K_911b
GSD36katy2piu:1782: na bhartā naiva ca suto K_911a
GSD36katy2piu:1790: nayec chuddhiṃ na yaḥ kūṭaṃ K_290c
GSD36katy2piu:1799: na lekhayati yat tv evaṃ K_139c
GSD36katy2piu:1800: na lekhyaṃ na ca sākṣiṇaḥ K_226d
GSD36katy2piu:1809: na śiras tatra vai bhṛguḥ K_413d
GSD36katy2piu:1814: na sa taṃ prāpnuyāt kāmaṃ K_730c
GSD36katy2piu:1827: na svāmī na ca vai śatruḥ K_114a
GSD36katy2piu:1965: naiva rikthī na riktaś ca K_115a
GSD36katy2piu:2109: pitrā dṛṣṭam ṛṇaṃ yat tu K_555a
GSD36katy2piu:2111: pitrā bhuktaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ K_326a
GSD36katy2piu:2205: pragatas tv aṃśabhāṅ na tu K_676d
GSD36katy2piu:2342: prāg uktaṃ ca punar bhajet K_887d
GSD36katy2piu:2367: prāptam etais tu yat kiṃcit K_651a
GSD36katy2piu:2371: prāptaṃ śilpais tu yad vittaṃ K_904a
GSD36katy2piu:2404: prītyā dattaṃ tu yat kiṃcit K_897a
GSD36katy2piu:2467: brāhmaṇo yatra na syāt tu K_067a
GSD36katy2piu:2482: bhartur arthe kṛtaṃ yat syād K_578c
GSD36katy2piu:2491: bhavet kūṭaṃ na cet kartā K_281c
GSD36katy2piu:2515: bhuktir eva tu gurvī syāt K_314c
GSD36katy2piu:2516: bhuktir eva hi gurvī syān K_226c
GSD36katy2piu:2524: bhuktyā prāptaṃ hi tasya tat K_326d
GSD36katy2piu:2547: bhogāt tatra na siddhiḥ syād K_335c
GSD36katy2piu:2601: mātā vā tat pituḥ kramāt K_928d
GSD36katy2piu:2643: mūrkhair lubdhaiś ca duṣṭaiś ca K_438e
GSD36katy2piu:2655: mūlyaṃ labdhaṃ tu yat kiṃcic K_898c
GSD36katy2piu:2666: mṛteṣv api hi teṣu ca K_287d
GSD36katy2piu:2676: mohād vā yadi vā śāṭhyād K_193a
GSD36katy2piu:2690: yat taiḥ prāptaṃ rakṣitaṃ vā K_677a
GSD36katy2piu:2730: yadā tv evaṃ vidhaḥ pakṣaḥ K_143a
GSD36katy2piu:2748: yad dattaṃ tat punar haret K_647d
GSD36katy2piu:2749: yad dattaṃ yat kṛtaṃ vātha K_464c
GSD36katy2piu:2752: yad dravyaṃ tat svakaṃ deyam K_640c
GSD36katy2piu:2773: yas tu na grāhayec śilpaṃ K_713a
GSD36katy2piu:2775: yas tv ato 'nyaḥ sa daṇḍabhāk K_092d
GSD36katy2piu:2776: yas tv ādhiṃ karma kurvāṇaṃ K_526a
GSD36katy2piu:2813: yāvaj jīvaṃ na hi svāmyaṃ K_924c
GSD36katy2piu:2821: yāvan na dadyād deyaṃ ca K_580c
GSD36katy2piu:2828: yā svaputraṃ tu jahyāt strī K_573a
GSD36katy2piu:2845: yena dāpyaḥ sa eva tat K_596d
GSD36katy2piu:2875: yo hy artho na vighātitaḥ K_144b
GSD36katy2piu:3025: vacanāt tatra na syāt tu K_776c
GSD36katy2piu:3066: varṣāṇy aṣṭau sa bhoktā syāt K_764e
GSD36katy2piu:3104: vādino na ca daṇḍyāḥ syuḥ K_092c
GSD36katy2piu:3118: vikrīyāc ca na caiva hi K_697d
GSD36katy2piu:3161: vidyā prāptān yatas tu yā K_867b
GSD36katy2piu:3177: vinā cihnais tu yat kāryaṃ K_797a
GSD36katy2piu:3253: viṣaṃ dadyāc ca na kvacit K_424d
GSD36katy2piu:3267: vṛttas tasya damo hi saḥ K_967d
GSD36katy2piu:3273: vṛddhiṃ vā labhate na saḥ K_525d
GSD36katy2piu:3351: śiṣyād āptaṃ ca yad bhavet K_872b
GSD36katy2piu:3362: śuddhāc ca vākyād yaḥ śuddhaḥ K_409c
GSD36katy2piu:3383: śoṣās tv ekaikam eva ca K_634d
GSD36katy2piu:3431: sa tam arthaṃ pradāpyaḥ syāt K_533c
GSD36katy2piu:3432: sa tasya dāso bhṛtyaḥ strī K_591c
GSD36katy2piu:3444: sa daṇḍyo na tv atikramī K_106d
GSD36katy2piu:3472: santoṣaṃ na gatas tu yaḥ K_496b
GSD36katy2piu:3553: sarvam eva tu dāpyaḥ syād K_474c
GSD36katy2piu:3688: sākṣī tatra na daṇḍyaḥ syād K_398c
GSD36katy2piu:3691: sākṣī sākṣyaṃ na ced brūyāt K_405a
GSD36katy2piu:3700: sā grāhyā na tu pūrṇāpi K_219c
GSD36katy2piu:3701: sā ced alpā tu sāgamā K_317d
GSD36katy2piu:3798: strī dhanaṃ sā na cārhati K_929b
GSD36katy2piu:3831: syāt pāpe hīne vadho bhṛguḥ K_801d
GSD36katy2piu:3851: svayam āptaṃ ca yad bhavet K_866b
GSD36katy2piu:3928: hṛtaṃ naṣṭaṃ ca yal labdhaṃ K_887c
